name: Foundation
goal: Project structure, Next.js, Supabase schema, design system

arc.started_believing: Need custom CMS for ski content
arc.transformation: Simplicity over features for faster launch

name: Core Agents
goal: Python agents, primitives, pipeline, MCP server

arc.ended_believing: Direct Python + Claude API simpler than MCP for autonomy
arc.transformation: Autonomous pipelines beat interactive tools for scale

name: Security Audit
goal: XSS prevention, legal pages, cookie consent, security headers

arc.ended_believing: Launch early, iterate with real traffic
arc.transformation: Production feedback more valuable than pre-launch polish

name: Compliance & Polish
goal: Monitoring, accessibility, CWV, trademark, internal linking, site stabilization

arc.ended_believing: They form an integrated observability and quality layer
arc.transformation: From compliance tasks to quality infrastructure

arc.started_believing: Claude can handle lists of all 3000 resorts in context
arc.ended_believing: Primitives should be atomic; agents query, not receive lists

name: Schema Contract Audit
goal: Fix schema mismatch causing 100% pipeline failure

arc.started_believing: Schema mismatches are coding errors to fix quickly
arc.ended_believing: The extraction layer's ambition was correct - expand schema to match user needs
arc.transformation: User-first schema design - DB should serve family budgeting needs

name: AI Discoverability & Email System
goal: AI crawler access, email system with welcome sequence, location display

arc.started_believing: Email is a simple SMTP integration
arc.ended_believing: Email is a full lifecycle system: capture, confirm, sequence, comply, track
arc.transformation: From send email to email infrastructure with CAN-SPAM compliance

name: External Linking & Affiliate System
goal: Google Places entity links, affiliate URL injection, GA4 click tracking, affiliate research

arc.started_believing: Affiliate links are just URL swaps
arc.ended_believing: External linking is a full pipeline stage: extract entities, resolve places, inject links, track clicks
arc.transformation: From link insertion to entity-aware link lifecycle

name: Quick Takes & Site Audit
goal: Editorial Verdict Model, About/Contact pages, email confirmation, quiz fixes

arc.started_believing: Quick Takes just need a better prompt
arc.ended_believing: Quality requires structure (hook/context/tension/verdict), forbidden phrases, and specificity scoring
arc.transformation: From prompt engineering to editorial system with quality gates

name: Scoring & Pipeline Stability
goal: Deterministic decimal scores, pipeline crash fixes, data extraction improvement

arc.ended_believing: Store atoms, compute molecules - deterministic formulas from data beat LLM opinion
arc.transformation: From AI-generated quality score to calculated score from verifiable data

name: Content Structure & Email Fix
goal: Guide page infrastructure, email template loading, welcome sequence fix

arc.started_believing: Guides need a new content system
arc.ended_believing: The JSONB content schema was already designed - just needed frontend rendering
arc.transformation: From building new infrastructure to wiring existing schema to frontend

name: Autonomous Content Systems
goal: Weekly newsletter pipeline, guide generation pipeline, exit intent popup

arc.started_believing: Newsletter and guides need separate generation systems
arc.ended_believing: Both share the same primitive layer - newsletter queries DB, guides generate to DB
arc.transformation: Autonomous content is just primitives composed differently on a cron schedule

name: Content Expansion & SEO Critical Fixes
goal: Olympics guides, guides workflow overhaul, canonical URL fixes, GSC/Bing indexing

arc.started_believing: SEO is about content and Schema.org markup
arc.ended_believing: A single trailing newline in an env var can block all indexing - infrastructure hygiene is SEO
arc.transformation: From content optimization to infrastructure correctness as the foundation of discoverability

name: Delightful, On-Brand, Image-Rich Guide Pages
goal: Guide page design overhaul, Nano Banana Pro image generation, exit intent popup redesign

arc.started_believing: Guide pages just needed images and a few bug fixes
arc.ended_believing: Brand personality requires systematic design overhaul AND reliable image infrastructure — Nano Banana Pro on Replicate is the default
arc.transformation: From patching individual issues to establishing Spielplatz as a living design standard with autonomous image generation
